meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Cohen Millicent Kidder Bruce Gardner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1697.

td.p: Michael Cohen, a fundraising consultant from Long Beach, California
Millicent Kidder, a civilian personnel officer from Kokomo, Indiana
Bruce Gardner, a veterinarian from Cerritos, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,201)

tr.td: RENAISSANCE MEN
WORLD CAPITALS
FOOD
QUOTES
SPORTS
APPROXIMATES WEIGHTS AND MEASURES

don\'t give up the ship

BruceMillicent
Triple Stumper
')
